text: Marvel's Spider-Man is a video game released in 2018. It was developed in 2018 by Insomniac Games. The story is about Spider-Man trying to stop the Super- villian Mister Negative from taking over New York City's criminal underworld. Marvel's Spider-Man was released for the PlayStation 4 on September 7, 2018. It had an expansion released called "The City That Never Sleeps" in late 2018. The game was remastered and released on the PlayStation 5 in November 2020 and later on PC. The game had a spin-off called Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales in November 2020 for the PlayStation 5 The game had a sequel called Marvel's Spider-Man 2 released in October 2023 for the PlayStation 5. ==Notes== ==References== Category:2018 video games Category:Spider-Man video games Category:Insomniac Games games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Beat 'em ups Category:Open-world video games Category:Organized crime video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Single-player video games Category:Superhero video games Category:Windows games Category:Articles containing video clips Category:Articles using Video game reviews template in single platform mode
